backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, places, routes, emergency profiles, SOS snapshots, meetup locations, and admin access control with authorization mixins and blob storage for verification documents.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: displaying a 'Request Admin Access' button on the Profile page and refreshing user roles after successful admin access requests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components for authentication, profile management, SOS functionality, admin guards, and the new useRequestAdminAccess mutation hook.
Manual smoke test checklist for flyer download functionality covering direct downloads, share dialog auto-export, link sharing, error handling, and quick share across desktop and mobile browsers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including sidebar, chart, and component-specific color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component defining TanStack Router configuration with all route definitions, including admin routes wrapped with AuthenticatedRouteGuard and AdminRouteGuard, plus theme provider and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denied screen component displaying when users lack admin permissions, featuring a 'Request Admin Access' button that calls useRequestAdminAccess mutation and triggers role refetch on success.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard component that checks if the authenticated user has admin role, showing loading state during verification and an access denied screen if the user is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Route guard component that requires Internet Identity authentication, displaying a login card if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity, clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with brand header, responsive sidebar navigation (desktop/mobile), main content area, and footer with Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation component displaying menu items for Places, Routes, Meetup, Profile, SOS, Emergency Lookup, and conditionally showing Admin Dashboard for admin users.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Sticky header component with "My Brother's Keeper" branding, share button, emergency lookup link for unauthenticated users, and login button.
frontend/src/components/maps/MapZoomCont: Settings control for selecting and persisting preferred map zoom level (10-20) for Google Maps links.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Card component for generating, displaying, copying, and rotating emergency access codes that trusted contacts can use with the user's Principal ID for emergency profile lookup.
A form component for users to create/update their emergency profile with next-of-kin contact and health conditions, requiring an access code and displaying warnings about privacy.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and create their initial user profile, blocking dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: A card component for uploading trucking license and ID proof documents with file validation, upload progress tracking, and verification status badges (Not Submitted, Pending Review, Approved).
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: A printable/exportable flyer component displaying app branding, feature list, and share URL in a formatted layout for physical distribution.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: A dialog for sharing the app via link copying, native share API, or navigating to flyer view/download, with error handling and user feedback.
frontend/src/components/sos/LastKnownLoc: Displays the last known GPS location from an SOS snapshot with timestamp, coordinates, Google Maps link, and a warning that it's a one-time snapshot not real-time tracking.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Renders emergency profile information (driver name, next-of-kin, health conditions) and last known location for first responders accessing an SOS alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that generates QR codes on canvas elements with status tracking, abort handling, and a 3-second safety timeout to prevent indefinite generation states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin operations, places, routes, meetups, and SOS functionality, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and mutation handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using an asphalt and high-visibility safety color scheme with yellow-orange accents.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Utility functions for generating, storing, retrieving, and clearing 12-character emergency access codes in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Resilient clipboard copy utility that attempts modern Clipboard API first, then falls back to deprecated execCommand for broader browser compatibility.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: File validation utilities enforcing 10MB size limit and allowed types (JPEG, PNG, WebP, PDF) with file size formatting helper.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Exports flyer components as PNG images by manually rendering content to canvas, including gradient backgrounds, text, icons, and QR codes for mobile-friendly sharing.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Provides a Promise-based wrapper around the browser's Geolocation API to get current latitude/longitude coordinates with error handling for permission, availability, and timeout scenarios.
frontend/src/lib/googleMapsUrl.ts: Builds Google Maps URLs from latitude/longitude coordinates with optional zoom level parameter.
frontend/src/lib/mapZoomPreference.ts: Manages user's map zoom preference in localStorage with get/set/clear operations, clamping values between 1-21 with a default of 15.
frontend/src/lib/meetupShareCode.ts: Generates 8-character alphanumeric meetup share codes (format: XXXX-XXXX) and manages their storage/retrieval in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Defines labels and utility functions for PlaceCategory enum values (hotel, restaurant, shop, gas station, mechanic).
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Provides validation and safe conversion utilities for DFINITY Principal IDs from text strings.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Standards-compliant QR Code generator implementing ISO/IEC 18004 with Reed-Solomon error correction, Galois field arithmetic, and proper positioning patterns (truncated content).
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Downloads a canvas element as a PNG file by converting to blob and triggering a download link, with validation for canvas readiness.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Attempts to share URLs using the Web Share API with automatic fallback to clipboard copying, returning detailed status results for appropriate user feedback.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the canonical absolute share URL for the application using window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between JavaScript Date objects and bigint nanosecond timestamps, with formatting functions for date/time display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Utilities for managing URL parameters in both query string and hash-based routing contexts, supporting get and clear operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Authenticated form page for adding new places with fields for name, category, location, and description, using React Hook Form and navigation (truncated content).
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Page for authenticated users to create and share a new route with start, destination, waypoints, date/time, and optional notes. Includes form validation and navigation back to routes list.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin-only dashboard with three tabs: user registrations list, verification review lookup, and SOS locations map view. Allows admins to approve/reject verifications and view emergency data.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Public page allowing first responders to look up driver emergency information using Principal ID and access code. Displays emergency profile and SOS snapshot if credentials are valid.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Page for generating and downloading a shareable flyer with QR code. Supports auto-export via URL parameter and manual download, with clipboard copy functionality for share URL.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showcasing app features (safe places, route sharing, emergency profiles, SOS) with hero section and feature cards. Redirects authenticated users to places page.
frontend/src/pages/MeetupPage.tsx: Provides real-time location sharing for meetups with periodic updates every 15 seconds, allowing users to start/stop sharing with a custom share code and look up others' locations using their principal ID and share code.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific safe place including name, location, category, description, and submitter, with navigation back to the places list.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists all safe places with search and category filtering capabilities, allowing authenticated users to add new places and view details of existing ones.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page displaying principal ID, verification uploads, emergency profile, emergency access code, and admin access request functionality for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page for displaying detailed route information with back navigation to the routes list.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays user's own routes and allows searching for other users' routes by principal ID, with options to add new routes and view route details in a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the user's emergency SOS card containing emergency profile information and SOS snapshot data for first responders, requiring authentication and a stored access code.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: React component for the Emergency SOS page that allows users to capture their current location as a one-time snapshot and view their SOS card, using geolocation API and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes, known issues (missing 'Request Admin Access' button), and existing features related to admin access request functionality.
